conversations.body_text: Hi Popescu Nicolae,    We sincerely apologize that the pedals are currently sold out at our German warehouse. We will ship them to you via DHL after restocking this week and refund the additional shipping fees.

Hello,

Do you have an update for me. When should I expect the delivery?

Kind regards,
Nicolae Popescu
________________________________

Hello,

Could you please let me know when should I expect the delivery? You mentioned that it will be send last week. Thanks!

Kind regards,
Nicolae Popescu

________________________________

Hi Popescu Nicolae,    We apologize for the delayed response. Your order was scheduled for shipment from our German warehouse, but due to shipping delays, the goods arrived later than expected. They arrived yesterday, and we have now shipped your order and updated your shipping notification.

All good, thank you! Happy holidays!

Sent from Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________
